channel.title: [RESOLVED - PARTIAL ADDED]Important links for the navigation bar
channel.description:
I suggest adding 2 more links to that navigation bar of ours.
How about make that banner for mopar link to http://moparisthebest.com/? You know, this banner: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/moparscape.png[/img]
And also, I suggest that we add the server status page into the navigation bar for easier access.
Thank you.
